pr_title: KOGITO-1157: [DMN Designer] New models must be named with the file name on VSCode

timeline.bodyText: Do we really have to mock the behaviour of this method!?!
timeline.author: manstis

timeline.bodyText: Do we really have to mock the behaviour of this method!?!
timeline.author: manstis

timeline.bodyText: I'm a stickler for parameters on new lines.. but it's just my opinion, so I state it but don't expect it to be fixed.
timeline.author: manstis

replies.bodyText: Like you I also prefer parameters on new lines, but sometimes the reviewers don't, so it's hard to know what to do. I'm changing anyway.
replies.author: danielzhe
